description: Requirements for observability, traceability, and explainable AI in ICDEV. Maps to NIST AI RMF MEASURE 2.5/2.7/2.8, DoD RAI Traceable principle, and ISO 42001.

requirements.title: Tracing Active
requirements.description: Distributed tracing must be active with OTel or SQLite backend. All agent operations must produce trace spans.

requirements.title: MCP Instrumentation Enabled
requirements.description: All MCP server tool calls must produce trace spans with tool name, duration, and status attributes.

requirements.title: A2A Distributed Tracing Active
requirements.description: Cross-agent spans must be linked via W3C traceparent propagation in A2A JSON-RPC metadata.

requirements.title: Provenance Graph Populated
requirements.description: W3C PROV-AGENT provenance graph must contain entities and activities for project artifacts and operations.

requirements.title: Content Tracing Policy Documented
requirements.description: Content tracing policy must be documented in observability_tracing_config.yaml specifying whether plaintext or hash-only recording is used.

requirements.title: SHAP Analysis Recent
requirements.description: AgentSHAP tool attribution analysis must have been run within the last 30 days for the project.

requirements.title: Decision Rationale Recorded
requirements.description: Architectural and operational decisions must have recorded rationale via decision_recorder.

requirements.title: Trace Retention Configured
requirements.description: Trace retention policy must be configured (SQLite and/or MLflow retention days) in observability_tracing_config.yaml.

requirements.title: AI Telemetry Active
requirements.description: AI telemetry logging must be active with recent entries (within 7 days) for the project.

requirements.title: Agent Trust Scoring Active
requirements.description: Agent trust scores must be computed and tracked for the project.
